summary: The diff successfully implements all three requirements: a game selection interface with Flappy Bird and other games (REQ-1), a fully playable Flappy Bird implementation with physics, obstacles, scoring, and game over detection (REQ-2), and integration into the GamePlayer component with high score tracking (REQ-3). All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the code evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: GameModeModal component with three-button interface (Play Built-in Games, Browse Games, Create Game)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies a game play button that opens a game selection interface showing available games. The implementation adds an intermediate modal with three choices, where 'Play Built-in Games' leads to the requested game selector. This adds navigation complexity not requested in the requirements.
